children.name: expand
Example - get all occurrences for a specific period

parameters.name: end `Date`
parameters.description: The end date of the period.

parameters.name: start `Date`
parameters.description: The start date of the period.

children.description: Expands all recurring events in the data and returns a list of events for a specific period.

children.name: schema.timezone
Example - configure the data source model model

children.description: The timezone which the data source will use to convert the scheduler event dates. By default the current system timezone is used.If the data source is initialized by the scheduler, its [timezone](/api/javascript/ui/scheduler#configuration-timezone) option will be used.The complete list of the supported timezones is available in the [List of IANA time zones](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_IANA_time_zones) Wikipedia page.

children.name: schema.model
Example - configure the data source model schema

children.description: The model configuration of the SchedulerDataSource. See [SchedulerEvent](/api/framework/schedulerevent#configuration) for more info.

children.name: schema
children.description: The schema configuration of the SchedulerDataSource.
